Articles.Content:
As the title suggests.

The staging setup in the vab is a nightmare.  It has no ability to auto arrange the stages as seen, much like how KSP has this.  While it isn't perfect, it at least does a decent enough job separating/sorting the stages properly.  KSP2, not so much.

Is anyone working on a mod to deal with that?  Or must we continue to suffer the indignity of manually dragging things around with that tedius interface waiting for the programmers to fix it

?
